name: Run for Syria
description:
Run through piles of debris and collect as much hope as you can, while conserving your energy and dodging hazardous obstacles.
You are running for hope to restore peace in a once thriving country. Motivate others to collect the broken pieces of their nation to see their glorious country shine again.
Along the way, collect fragments of hope to progressively rebuild the beautiful cities of Syria. Keep your stamina full by grabbing energy drinks and train yourself by collecting sugar and upgrading your running skills.
